Package game

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Behaviour
    A factory for creating actions.
    CraftableItem
    An interface which marks items as craftable.
    Healing
    Interface for any object that is capable of healing an actor
    HitProbability
    Interface for anything that has a chance of hitting or missing.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Application
    The main class for the zombie apocalypse game.
    Arm
    Represents an Arm and can be used as a weapon.
    AttackAction
    Special Action for attacking other Actors.
    AttackBehaviour
    A class that generates an AttackAction if the current Actor is standing next to an Actor that they can attack.
    Bite
    Class for a bite weapon.
    Corpse
    A Corpse.
    CraftAction
    An action for crafting a CraftableItem into a different item
    Crop
    A Crop class.
    Dirt
    A class that represents bare dirt.
    EatAction
    Special Action for eating food.
    EatBehaviour
    Class that determines how or whether a human can eat based on their inventory and the ground.
    FarmBehaviour
    Class that determines how or whether an actor can farm surroundings.
    Farmer
    Class for farmers, those that grow the food in the game.
    FarmerHarvestAction
    Class for Farmer Harvesting, rather than the item going into inventory it instead goes on the ground
    Fence
    An impenetrable barrier.
    FertiliseAction
    Class for the action that fertilises a crop
    FollowBehaviour
    A class that figures out a MoveAction that will move the actor one step closer to a target Actor.
    Food
    Food class, an item that can be eaten by humans and drops after harvesting a crop
    HarvestAction  
    HarvestBehaviour
    A behaviour for harvesting ripe crops and placing them in the actor's inventory
    Hoe
    Weapon used by farmers.
    Human
    Class representing an ordinary human.
    HumanHarvestAction
    Class for regular human's Harvesting, where the time is added to the actors inventory
    HuntBehaviour
    Returns a MoveAction that will take the Actor closer to the nearest instance of a target class.
    Leg
    Represents a Leg and can be used as a weapon.
    Limb
    Represents a Zombie's limb and can be used as a weapon.
    MissableIntrinsicWeapon
    An IntrinsicWeapon that defines its chance of missing.
    PickupWeaponBehaviour
    A class that generates a PickupItemAction if there is a weapon at the actor's location.
    Plank
    A primitive weapon.
    Player
    Class representing the Player.
    PortableItem
    Base class for any item that can be picked up and dropped.
    Punch
    Class for a bite weapon.
    SowAction
    Action class for sowing a crop, will change the ground from dirt to crop.
    Tree
    A tree that starts as a sapling and grows into a large tree.
    WanderBehaviour
    Allows an Actor to wander around at random.
    Zombie
    A Zombie.
    ZombieActor
    Base class for Actors in the Zombie World
    ZombieClub
    A weapon made from a zombie arm
    ZombieMace
    A weapon made from a zombie leg
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ZombieCapability
